content.text:
# Nicholas Ward

Nicholas Ward or Nick Ward may refer to:
Music
*Nicholas Ward, English violinist and musical director of the Northern Chamber Orchestra 1985–2022
*Nick Ward (Australian musician), wrote the score for the 2025 film Jimpa
*Nick Ward (Welsh musician), Welsh singer / songwriter
*Nick Ward, drummer and vocalists in the original lineup of Australian band The Church
Politics
*Nicholas Ward (MP for Downpatrick) (1630–?), Irish MP for Downpatrick
*Nicholas Ward, 2nd Viscount Bangor (1750–1827), Irish MP for Bangor
Sport
*Nicholas Ward (boxer) (1811–1850), English bare-knuckle fighter
*Nick Ward (basketball) (born 1997), American basketball player
*Nick Ward (footballer, born 1977), Welsh footballer
*Nick Ward (soccer, born 1985), Australian association footballer
Others
*Nick Ward (physician), British physician and expert on smallpox
